bibl.title: The Fate of the Temples in Late Antique Egypt.
bibl.note: Introduction: From temple to church? - The sources: use and limitations. - The fate of the temples in the first cataract region: case study. - Concluding remarks.
bibl.seg: Dijkstra Jitse H.F., The Fate of the Temples in Late Antique Egypt.
L. Lavan and M. Mulryan (Edd.), The Archaeology of Late Antique 'Paganism' = Late Antique Archaeology. 7 (Leiden, 2011) pp. 389-436.
Introduction: From temple to church? - The sources: use and limitations. - The fate of the temples in the first cataract region: case study. - Concluding remarks.
